description: Generate a restaurant booking reservation or cancellation email to the users

input_variables.name: RestaurantName
input_variables.description: The name of the restaurant for the reservation.

input_variables.name: BookingDate
input_variables.description: The date and time of the reservation.

input_variables.name: Count
input_variables.description: The number of people for the reservation.

input_variables.name: CustomerName
input_variables.description: The name of the customer making the reservation.

input_variables.name: CustomerEmail
input_variables.description: The email address of the customer.

input_variables.name: CustomerPhone
input_variables.description: The phone number of the customer.
